item.title: Introduction
item.description: What follows is a short story introduction to Waterdeep. Waterdeep is a very big and rich city, strewn with wealth and criminality.

item.title: Character Options
item.description: We are using the 2024 D&D Rules. Character creation is to be done in D&D Beyond.

item.title: Guilds and Factions and Nobility
item.description: Let us differentiate between guilds and factions. Guilds are legal entities that represent groups of people based on trade.
